name: Rebellion (White Panda Game Studios)
description:
Made for 
Historically Accurate Game Jam 3 by Clint lenard in 7 days
The corrupt king has kidnapped your family, after you protested against him.It is up to you to fight against him to save your family and village.


Note:you might be wondering how this relates to the theme. cold war was nothing but small civil wars, so in this game you fight against the corrupt king. I made the  setting in the medieval era to make it interesting. hope you enjoy!!!

Controls:
wasd-player movement
0-on/off shadows
Left mouse button- attack
Right mouse button-aim
Space-jump
Assets- Mixamo.com, Archive 3d.net and Freesound.org
Programs used- Blender, Mixamo, Coppercube 6.3, Filmora 9 and Pixlr x
